long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price comparison made easy in finnish webstores.

This extension displays price comparison information from Hinta.fi -service in finnish webstores verkkokauppa.com, gigantti.fi, jimms.fi, expert.fi, mustaporssi.fi and prisma.fi.

If the product is available at a cheaper price through Hinta.fi, a green informational box is displayed. If the product is cheaper in the current webstore, a red informational box is shown.

Support for additional webstores is planned.

Any questions and feedback can be sent to (olzi 'at' iki.fi).

0.2.1 Update: Content scripts are inserted only into relevant webpages.
0.2.2 Update: Jimms.fi, Expert.fi, Mustaporssi.fi and Prisma.fi webstores added.
